original_text: Joab reported the number of the fighting men to the king: In Israel there were eight hundred thousand able-bodied men who could handle a sword, and in Judah five hundred thousand.
korean_text: 요압이 백성의 수를 왕께 보고하니 곧 이스라엘에서 칼을 빼는 담대한 자가 팔십만 명이요 유다 사람이 오십만 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: Joab reported the number of the fighting men to the king
In Israel there were eight hundred thousand able-bodied men
and in Judah five hundred thousand
